snippet: To prevent cuts to the Pentagon’s budget, House Republicans have chosen to cut programs that help some of the most vulnerable Americans.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for voting to prevent $55 billion in automatic cuts imposed on the Pentagon, choosing instead to make cuts from domestic programs; contends Republicans are determined to protect millionaires and defense contracts, no matter the cost to the country.
lead_paragraph: To prevent cuts to the Pentagon’s budget, House Republicans have chosen to cut programs that help some of the most vulnerable Americans.
